sentence.value: Liu, along with Zhai Zhigang and Jing Haipeng, were chosen to be the main crew of Shenzhou 7, with Zhai as commander, on 17 September 2008.

sentence.value: On 25 September, at 21:10 CST, they launched into space as China's third human spaceflight mission, and the first Chinese mission ever to have a three-man crew.

sentence.value: Liu wore a Russian Orlan-M spacesuit, while Zhai wore the Chinese-made Feitian space suit.

sentence.value: Liu remained in the open portal of the orbital module, assisting Zhai on his spacewalk; later in the space walk, Liu also performed a stand-up extra-vehicular activity, partially leaving the orbital module in order to hand Zhai a Chinese flag.
